channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.description: CASPER theme for hugo Casper is a single-column theme for Hugo. Ported from Casper theme for Ghost blog demo : http://vjeantet.fr blog source : https://github.com/vjeantet/vjeantet.fr Features Google Analytics (optional) Disqus ( can disable comments by content) Share buttons on Facebook, Twitter, Google (can disable share by content) Big cover image (optional) Custom cover by content (optional) Tagging Pagination Menu Syntax Highlighting Theme usage and asumptions All blog posts are in the post folder (content/post) The homepage displays a paginated list of contents from the post Section (other contents may be added to main menu, see bellow) Installation Installing this theme mkdir themes cd themes git clone https://github.
